public RatingResponseDto addRating​(@RequestBody @Validated

        method receives request for rating creation, redirects the request to rating service
        Parameters:
        ratingRequestDto - is an object made from: pitchId, userId and value of rate

      • getAverageRating

        @GetMapping
public RatingAverageDto getAverageRating​(@RequestParam("pitchId")
                                         java.lang.Integer pitchId)
        method receives request for getting rating, redirects the request to rating service
        Parameters:
        pitchId - is a pitch id from which we are eager to get average rating
        Returns:
        pitch id and its average rating got from service
